title: Angband orc

| An Angband orc:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is an orc.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in large [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                  |

**Angband orcs**, found in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), are much stronger than regular orcs, being survivors from the First Age. In most cases, they appear only in the company of an [orc of the ages of stars](/wiki/Orc_of_the_ages_of_stars "Orc of the ages of stars"). As such, they will probably not be encountered until the [ascension run](/wiki/Ascension_run "Ascension run"), at which point the character will probably be more than strong enough to deal with them.

However, Angband orcs do randomly generate in the Borehole, the lowest section of the Tolkien-themed Chaos quest. Angband orcs encountered at this point in the mid-game should not be taken lightly due to their high damage output.
html:
Angband orc

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Angband
o Angband orc (No tile)
Difficulty 24
Attacks Weapon 2d6 physical, Weapon 2d6 physical
o Angband orc (No tile)
Difficulty 24
Attacks

Weapon 2d6 physical, Weapon 2d6 physical

Base level 20
Base experience 584
Speed 18
Base AC 5
Base MR 25
Alignment −10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 200
Size medium
Resistances cold, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed cold

An Angband orc:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is an orc.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in large groups.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

Angband orcs, found in dNetHack, are much stronger than regular orcs, being survivors from the First Age. In most cases, they appear only in the company of an orc of the ages of stars. As such, they will probably not be encountered until the ascension run, at which point the character will probably be more than strong enough to deal with them.

However, Angband orcs do randomly generate in the Borehole, the lowest section of the Tolkien-themed Chaos quest. Angband orcs encountered at this point in the mid-game should not be taken lightly due to their high damage output.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Angband_orc&oldid=134925"

'''Angband orcs''', found in [[dNetHack]], are much stronger than regular orcs, being survivors from the First Age.  In most cases, they appear only in the company of an [[orc of the ages of stars]].  As such, they will probably not be encountered until the [[ascension run]], at which point the character will probably be more than strong enough to deal with them.

However, Angband orcs do randomly generate in the Borehole, the lowest section of the Tolkien-themed Chaos quest. Angband orcs encountered at this point in the mid-game should not be taken lightly due to their high damage output.
